description:
Carbage is a charming, easy-to-use, no-threshold, bumper car game for everyone with a cartoonish style, where you can play with your friends.

Pick your drivers – Who will be the winner today? 

The screaming punk, the redheaded woman, the cute teddy bear, or the funny alien? They are all already waiting in the starting blocks to overtake their opponents and overcome obstacles to the win. 

Be fast and smart

Press the gas to the throttle. Together with your friends, fight for first place.  Be the fastest of the fast and win the race.


Survive and unlock each game mode: 

CAPTURE THE CROWN 

Try to hold the crown for 30 seconds and watch your teammates – they will definitely like to take it from you. 

SURVIVAL 

Wherever you drive, the floor disappears – be the last car standing!

DEMOLUTION 

Destroy buildings, and collect most of the cute pixel cubes to take your rightful victory.

RACE 

Try your best in the most classical game mode – beat your friends with your speed and stand on the top of the leaderboard.

Key Features: 
- 4 game modes 
- several characters to choose from 
- cute cartoon-style graphics
name: Carbage
